name: Lil Butta Dropz Mini Whipped Oil Body Cream Trio
about: What it is:A limited-edition body-moisturizer trio that delivers intense hydration in a nourishing whipped-oil cream..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Loss of Firmness, and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- Seven Luxe Oils: Nourish skin and deliver a healthy-looking sheen..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This mini body-cream trio delivers long-lasting hydration and a glossy finish. They contain antioxidant- and vitamin C-packed Barbados cherry extract to restore vibrancy, while glycerin locks in moisture. This trio also features three festive scents and shimmers to keep or share: Fenty Fresh, Salted Caramel, and Toasted Marshmallow..This Set Contains:- 3 x 2.5 oz/ 75 mL in Butta Dropz Whipped Oil Body Cream Mini in Toasted Marshmallow, Salted Caramel, Fenty Fresh.Clinical Results:In a four-week clinical study on 55 people, instantly:.Clean at Sephora
ingredients: -Seven Luxe Oils: Nourish skin and deliver a healthy-looking sheen..-Shea Butter: Helps condition and support the moisture barrier..-Mango Butter: Antioxidant-rich properties restore visible suppleness...Dropz Whipped Oil Body Cream Mini in Toasted Marshmallow: .Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Cetearyl Olivate, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Seed Oil, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Adansonia how_to_use: Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These smell so amazing I love the salted caramel especially and it gives a beautiful glow to the skin. Hopefully the salted caramel comes in full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product so much they all smell delicious and amazing I only wish salted caramel came in a bigger size!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all 3. Some people dont like the shimmer but I love it. I use them daily. I like how they smell layered with my favorite perfumes. Not over powering at all. The price was affordable. I purchased for $29 which I think was worth it.
